law.catch_line: Policies to be legible -- Factors to be considered -- Type face style approved by commissioner.

text.section: All insurance policies subject to the provisions of KRS 304.14-420 to 304.14-450 shall be printed in legible type and in a type face style approved by the commissioner. The commissioner shall by regulation establish a list of type face styles approved as acceptable.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1159, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 225, sec. 15, effective July 15, 1988.
